articles.title: Senate takes first step toward ending the government shutdown
articles.description:
Three New England lawmakers — New Hampshire Sen. Jeanne Shaheen, New Hampshire Sen. Maggie Hassan and Independent Sen. Angus King of Maine — broke the stalemate on Sunday.

The post Senate takes first step toward ending the government shutdown appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Senate advances bill to end government shutdown, easing concerns for local services.
New England Senators Jeanne Shaheen, Maggie Hassan, and Angus King led negotiations on November 5.
Potential funding restoration could benefit Boston's public programs and services.

articles.title: Celtics bench shines in bounce-back win over Magic: 7 takeaways
articles.description:
The Celtics claimed a split in their two-game series against the Magic with a 111-107 win.

The post Celtics bench shines in bounce-back win over Magic: 7 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics secured a 111-107 victory against the Magic on November 9.
Bench players contributed significantly, enhancing team depth and performance.
This win boosts Celtics' morale and strengthens their position in the season.
